name: GoodEarth
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Transform to smart home made easy with Alexa. Control Good Earth Smart lights throughout your home with your voice. Simply ask Alexa on your Amazon Echo, Echo Dot, Amazon Tap or Echo Show to turn lights on/off, adjust dimming/brightness, change RGB colors, change from warm white to cool white, set schedules, timers, and more. There’s no need to go to the switch to adjust your home lights.

After connecting Alexa to your Good Earth products in a few simple steps:
1. Download "Good Earth" app in Android or iOS app store.
2. Register one Good Earth account in our "Good Earth" app.
3. You need to have some Good Earth devices in hand.
4. Configure these devices in our “Good Earth" app and change appropriate name for your devices which will be used in "Good Earth" skills.
5. Download Amazon "Alexa" app from Android, iOS or Amazon app store.
6. Configure Echo or Echo Dot with "Alexa" app.
7. Search "Good Earth" skill from the "Alexa" app skills category.
8. Follow the instructions on the page to complete linking，you'll be redirect to the success page.
9. Now all setup is finished. 

Enjoy some of the voice commands such as:
Turn on/off 
• “Alexa, turn on my light" 
• "Alexa, turn off my light" 
Color Changing 
• "Alexa, set Basement light to blue" 
Color Temperature 
• "Alexa, set Bedroom light to warm white"
Brightness 
• "Alexa, dim Kitchen light to 20 percent“
